trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>이벤트가 발생할 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤 사이 변경 편집, 삽입 및 읽기-쓰기 모드로 모드는 실제로 변경 되기 전에 하 려 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 구성 하는 등의 사용자 지정 루틴을 수행 하는 이벤트 처리기를 제공할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>특정 모드에 대 한 제어 하거나이 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 모드 변경을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewModeEventArgs object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is changing, to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewModeEventArgs 개체 모드를 확인할 수 있는 이벤트 처리기에 전달 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>확인 하려면 컨트롤이 변경 되 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>사용자 편집 작업을 취소로 인해 또는 삽입 작업을 취소 해야 함을 나타내기 위해 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the new mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 새 모드를 확인 하려면 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property to change to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>속성 중 하나를 설정 하 여 대체 모드를 변경 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode>열거형 값입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A> property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>속성을 사용자가 편집 작업을 취소 여부를 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel an insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 삽입 작업을 취소 하려면는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewModeEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 목록이 DetailsViewModeEventArgs 클래스의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하려면이 생성자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> 의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>|The value of the `cancelingEdit` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>|The value of the `mode` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 초기 값 | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>| 값은 `cancelingEdit` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>| 값은 `mode` 매개 변수입니다. | > [!NOTE] > 이벤트를 발생 시킬 때이 생성자는 주로 컨트롤 개발자가 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>나타내는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> 이벤트가 었 고, 그렇지 않으면 사용자가 편집 작업을 취소의 결과로 발생 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> 이벤트 사용자 편집 작업을 취소로 인해 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>이벤트가 발생할 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤 사이 변경 편집, 삽입 및 읽기-쓰기 모드로 모드는 실제로 변경 되기 전에 하 려 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Use the CancelingEdit property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: CancelingEdit 속성을 사용 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>이벤트 사용자 편집 작업을 취소로 인해 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control whenever the user cancels an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 수 다시 설정 하려는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>제어 때마다 사용자가 편집 작업을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>나타내는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging"> </xref> 이벤트가 었 고, 그렇지 않으면 사용자가 편집 작업을 취소의 결과로 발생 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is changing.
trans-unit.target: 모드를 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> 컨트롤이 전환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the NewMode property to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is changing.
trans-unit.target: NewMode 속성을 사용 하 여 모드를 결정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤이 전환.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control based on the mode to which it changes.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 구성 하려면 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤을 변경 하는 모드에 따라.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to specify the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 모드를 지정 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>중 하나로 설정 하 여 변경 내용을 제어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode>열거형 값입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.
